name: Coalescence (Random Thoughts)
description:
There's strength in numbers! In the cruel, survival of the fittest world of Coalescence, convince other blobs to join together, either willingly or by force, to unlock more powerful skills and increase your chances of survival. How long will you last?

How to play:

Go near other blob leaders (more brightly colored) to try and recruit them and their followers (if any). Gain more followers to unlock more skills! Beware though, other leaders can do the same...

move - WASD

Volley (shoot) - Left Click

Shield - Right Click

Sprint - Left Shift

Heal - Space

(Note: There is a maximum number of followers per leader, so if you are not gaining any more followers you have probably hit the max)
